statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.SearchBrandID , AA.ActivityDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMSearchBrandActivity AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SearchBrandID = #SearchBrandID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.SearchBrandID , AA.ActivityDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMSearchBrandActivity AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMSearchBrandActivity ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, SearchBrandID, ActivityDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #SearchBrandID#, #ActivityDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMSearchBrandActivity SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, SearchBrandID = #SearchBrandID# , ActivityDate = #ActivityDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
